description: From a series of four etchings for the story "Der Rebell" by Manfred Georg, Heinrich Hochstim-Verlag, Berlin, 1918; man in lower left corner with hands holding onto a railing in front of him; sketchily drawn figures behind him, some wearing tophats; in the lower right corner is a small head with large round eyes wearing a tiny tophat on the left side of his head
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert. / Probedruck. 2. Zustand. E.120-II
portfolio: From Plate 2 from Der Rebell (The Rebel), Manfred Georg, Heinrich Hochstim-Verlag, Berlin, 1918
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18 | LL in pencil, below image: Manfred Georg : der Rebell.
title: Robert in the Theater, Plate 2 from Der Rebell (The Rebel)
